reviewText:
To Watch/download FREE
Please don't pay these people (they got this free and now are trying to profit)

just go to jw dot org
on the bottom right click on "watch sign language videos"
you can choose whatever sign language you prefer
just scroll through until you find this one

Or  to get a free copy use the contact form and jw.org to contact Jehovahs witnesses to get one or if you know one of Jehovah's witnesses they'd be happy to help you get one.
